spirit:register.spirit:name: version
spirit:register.spirit:description: Version

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_status
spirit:register.spirit:description: Error bits for source/sink and misc status bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: aux_sense_p_in_debounce
spirit:field.spirit:description: Aux + line status after de-bouncing 1: DP source device is not connected 0: DP source device is connected

spirit:field.spirit:name: aux_sense_n_in_debounce
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Aux - line status after de-bouncing
1: DP source device provides power on DP_PWR pin 0: DP source device does not provide power for sink

spirit:field.spirit:name: aux_sense_p_in
spirit:field.spirit:description: Aux + line status 1: DP source device is not connected 0: DP source device is connected

spirit:field.spirit:name: aux_sense_n_in
spirit:field.spirit:description: Aux - line status 1: DP source device provides power on DP_PWR pin 0: DP source device does not provide power for sink

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_ctrl1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_timer
spirit:field.spirit:description: 400us response timer setting in 0.0625 us step

spirit:field.spirit:name: response_timer
spirit:field.spirit:description: 300us response timer setting in 0.0625 us step

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_ctrl2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: pre_charge_length
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of Zeroes in pre-charge period (register value + 1)

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_ctrl3
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_aux_hpd_clk_freq
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP Aux and Hpd clock frequency in Mhz

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_rx
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux receiver data and flag register

spirit:register.spirit:name: aux_tx
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux transmitter data and flag register

spirit:field.spirit:name: go_bit
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to assert aux go_bit (source or sink)

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_status
spirit:register.spirit:description: Error bits for source/sink and misc status bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_line_in_debounce
spirit:field.spirit:description: HPD line in after de-bouncing status

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_ctrl
spirit:register.spirit:description: HPD generator control bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_low
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to generate LOW on HPD

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_high
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to generate HIGH on HPD

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_replug
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to generate a long pulse on HPD

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to generate IRQ pulse on HPD

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_timer1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq_to_irq_min_gap
spirit:field.spirit:description: 2048 us hpd_irq to hpd_irq minimum gap setting in 64 us step step (spec indicates minimum of 2ms)

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq_pulse_width
spirit:field.spirit:description: 768 us hpd_irq pulse setting in 64 us step (spec indicates 0.5ms to 1ms)

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_timer2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_replug_pulse_width
spirit:field.spirit:description: 9.984us hpd_replug pulse setting in 64 us step (spec indicates 2ms to 100ms)

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_timer3
spirit:register.spirit:description: Aux control

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq_rising_detect
spirit:field.spirit:description: Rising pulse 2ms detection of hpd_irq (in 64us steps)

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq_falling_detect
spirit:field.spirit:description: Falling pulse 0.25ms detection of hpd_irq (in 64us steps)

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_aux_debounce_period
spirit:field.spirit:description: De-bounce period of 100ms for hpd and aux sense signals (in 64us steps)

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_rise_det
spirit:register.spirit:description: HPD line falling edge counter logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 and then 0 to reset the counter.

spirit:register.spirit:name: hpd_fall_det
spirit:register.spirit:description: HPD line falling edge counter logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 and then 0 to reset the counter.

spirit:register.spirit:name: dp_source_connect_det
spirit:register.spirit:description: DP source connect detect counter logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 and then 0 to reset the counter.

spirit:register.spirit:name: dp_source_disconnect_det
spirit:register.spirit:description: DP source disconnect detect counter logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 and then 0 to reset the counter.

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_source_connect_det
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable dp_source_connect_det interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_source_disconnect_det
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable dp_source_disconnect_det interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_rise_det
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_rise_det interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_fall_det
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_fall_det interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_source_powered
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable dp_source_powered interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_source_detected
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable dp_source_detected interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_disconnect
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_disconnect interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_connect
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_connect interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_irq
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_irq interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: hpd_replug
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable hpd_replug interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable reply timeout interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: defer_sent
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable defer_sent interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: go_bit_clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable go_bit_clear interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_fifo_pkt_received
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable rx_fifo_pkt_received interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
